name: Alhaitham
title: "Admonishing Instruction" Alhaitham
desc: Learning, thinking, and taking care of business.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Alhaitham to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

skills.name: Universality: An Elaboration on Form
skills.desc: Deals 2 <span style="color:#7EC236FF">Dendro DMG. This character gains <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Chisel-Light Mirror.

skills.name: Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena
skills.desc: Deals 4 <span style="color:#7EC236FF">Dendro DMG, consumes <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Chisel-Light Mirror, with the DMG bonus based on <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Chisel-Light Mirror's <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Duration (Rounds) consumed.If <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Chisel-Light Mirror <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Duration (Rounds) consumed is 0/1/2, then apply <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Chisel-Light Mirror with 3/2/1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Duration (Rounds) to this character.
